body: Im so so sorry Peachy. Ive been having a really bad day today and it just makes me do stuff that I shouldn't be doing :( hopefully you forgive me im so so sorry
body_tagged: Im so so sorry Peachy. Ive been having a really bad day today and it just makes me do stuff that I shouldn't be doing :( hopefully you forgive me im so so sorry
title: Sorry Peachy

replies.body:
If this is an appeal, then please email support@avicus.net.
If it's an apology, try Skyping Peach next time, instead of making a post.
It takes guts to apologize, and I respect you for that.
replies.body_tagged:
If this is an appeal, then please email support@avicus.net.

replies.body: Don't worry about it then... your only temp banned 1 day.
replies.body_tagged: Don't worry about it then... your only temp banned 1 day.

replies.body: If he wants to apologize for his mistakes, he should be allowed to do so.  I have much respect for him doing it on the forums because if he did it on Skype, then it wouldn't be so special because only Peach would see it.  But he did it in public for everyone to see.  Much respect.
